resources:
HomeScreen --> In this game mode you can train your skills with Katakana and Hiragana syllables! In this game mode you can train your skills with Katakana,Hiragana and Kaji words! In this game mode you can your skills with Katakana,Hiragana and Kaji words with images! words images syllables
Font --> Which font do you want to train today ? Katakana is for words that were taken from foreign languages Hiragana is for simple Japanese Words Kanji is for regular Japanese Words
Which letter do you want to train today ? The shown word will be Romaji The shown word will be in Japanese
Which mode do you choose ? Choose between four possibilities Type in the correct word
Buttons --> next go
points
Hey, Congratulations! finish of
